duties_responsibilities.duty: Clean and maintain private residences to ensure a sanitary and comfortable space for residents and guests.
Perform laundry service and daily changing of residents' beds, including ironing and pressing as needed.
Inspect rooms and communal areas to ensure high standards of hygiene and cleanliness at all times.
Reset areas after use, keeping safety and sanitation as a motivating factor in daily work.

education_certification.credential: High School Diploma or equivalent preferred
